entry.title: [EU/CA][Web Hosting] - Servers maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 23, 20:00 - 22:00 UTC

Apr 18, 12:23 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 23/04/2025 20:00 UTC
End time : 23/04/2025 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Tasks created by customers for their Web Hosting services won't be treated during the maintenance.
But these tasks will be handled after the maintenance.
Please note that Web Hosting Services will still be available without interruption during the operation.
However, only the management of Web Hosting services will be impacted.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple servers on our Web Hosting offer.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA/RBX/SBG][Collaborative solutions] - Hosted/EmailPro/Mxplan/Private Exchange maintenance notification
entry.content:
Apr 18, 13:27 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 18, 13:25 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 10, 14:14 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 3, 18:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 3, 15:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted, Emailpro, Mxplan and Private Exchange.

Start time : 03/04/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 30/04/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted, Emailpro, Mxplan and Private Exchange offers by disabling TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1.

The deprecation of TLS 1.0 and 1.1, as well as the removal of the aforementioned cipher suites, will be implemented as follows:
• TLS 1.0 and 1.1 will no longer be supported on our infrastructure, and any attempts to connect using these protocols will result in a connection error.
• The removed cipher suites will be replaced with the updated alternatives, which will be used for all new connections.
• We recommend that all users ensure their clients and applications are configured to use TLS 1.2, and support the updated cipher suites.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1][Web Hosting] - Maintenance notification for multiple Filerz
entry.content:
Apr 3, 02:02 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All the services have been operational since 01:49 UTC

Apr 2, 21:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 27, 21:18 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 02/04/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 03/04/2025 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Each Filerz listed below will be temporarily unavailable for 20 minutes during the operation :
Cluster028 - Filerz1567/Filerz1514
Cluster031 - Filerz1595/Filerz1590/Filerz1588/Filerz1574
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple Filerz to improve the performance and stability of the service.

Thank you for your understanding.
